name: Kaku! Ugoku! Tsukamaeru! Sensei Wii
overview: I can draw so much with Wii! In Addition to the five kinds of stamps that can draw easily, 12 kinds of colors can be selected. Action painting of the unique operation of the Wii remote control is possible! It is also possible to draw using Nintendo DS touch pen with DS download play. Sending a drawing that draws, it moves like two kinds of fields (either sea or island) as if it had life! It will be a dream for children to start paintings of animals and planes drawn by yourself. In the field that sent out a picture, you can explore the inside of the field. You can take pictures and catch pictures with the Wii remote control. You can move the viewpoint using Nunchaku. Let's explore the field together with parents! It is!
